leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-性质预测与材料信息学生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 数据库 + 模型库 + benchmark

queries: [WEB] machine learning for materials science github
[WEB] deep learning materials property prediction github
[WEB] graph neural networks for crystal structures github

tools.name: 3D-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning framework for molecular property prediction using 3D information
tools.detailed_description: A novel contrastive learning framework designed to enhance molecular property prediction by incorporating 3D molecular information, developed by the AI-HPC Research Team.

tools.name: EM3P2
tools.one_line_profile: Evidential Meta Model for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of an Evidential Meta Model designed for predicting molecular properties, providing uncertainty estimation alongside predictions.

tools.name: iupacGPT
tools.one_line_profile: IUPAC-based large-scale molecular pre-trained model
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale pre-trained model leveraging IUPAC nomenclature for molecular property prediction and molecular generation tasks.

tools.name: MMELON (biomed-multi-view)
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view Molecular Embedding with Late Fusion for property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the MMELON architecture that combines molecular representations from image, graph, and text views to learn a joint embedding for downstream chemical and biological property prediction.

tools.name: QSPRpred
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for creating Quantitative Structure Property/Activity Relationship models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive tool designed to facilitate the creation, training, and evaluation of Quantitative Structure Property/Activity Relationship (QSPR/QSAR) models for drug discovery and materials science.

tools.name: Pin-Tuning
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter-Efficient In-Context Tuning for Few-Shot Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Source code for the NeurIPS 2024 paper 'Pin-Tuning', implementing a parameter-efficient in-context tuning method for few-shot molecular property prediction.

tools.name: LLM4Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Large Language Models for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation code for the paper 'Can Large Language Models Empower Molecular Property Prediction?', exploring the use of LLMs for chemical property tasks.

tools.name: Equivariant-Graph-Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid EGNN and Transformer architecture for molecular properties
tools.detailed_description: A deep neural network combining Equivariant Graph Neural Networks (EGNN) and Transformers for accurate prediction of molecular properties.

tools.name: MegNET_2020 (Neuroscience)
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic ICA-Based Artifact Removal for MEG
tools.detailed_description: A spatiotemporal convolutional neural network for automatic ICA-based artifact removal in Magnetoencephalography (MEG) data. (Note: Distinct from Materials MEGNet)

tools.name: spci
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for mining structure-property relationships from chemical datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed for mining and analyzing structure-property relationships within chemical datasets, aiding in materials and drug discovery.

tools.name: MatDeepLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks package for materials chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive package for applying graph neural networks (GNNs) to materials chemistry, facilitating property prediction and materials design.

tools.name: meta-learning-qsar
tools.one_line_profile: Meta-Learning GNN Initializations for Low-Resource Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of meta-learning strategies for initializing Graph Neural Networks to improve molecular property prediction in low-resource scenarios.

tools.name: MolCap-Arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark on Language-Enhanced Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive captioning benchmark and associated codebase for language-enhanced molecular property prediction.

tools.name: Protify
tools.one_line_profile: Low code molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A low-code tool designed to simplify the process of molecular property prediction for researchers.

tools.name: MgBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Prompt-Engineered LLM for Materials Classification
tools.detailed_description: Source code for a prompt-engineered Large Language Model workflow designed for materials classification tasks.

tools.name: GS-Meta
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Sampling-based Meta-Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Code for the IJCAI2023 paper implementing a graph sampling-based meta-learning approach for molecular property prediction.

tools.name: MEGNetSparse
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse GNN for defects in 2D materials
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing a graph neural network with sparse representation for learning the properties of defects in 2D materials.

tools.name: polymer_property_prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for prediction of polymeric material properties
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by IBM for the prediction of various properties of polymeric materials.

tools.name: fastprop
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Molecular Property Prediction with mordredcommunity
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fast molecular property prediction leveraging descriptors from mordredcommunity.

tools.name: Perov_CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning for all-inorganic perovskites photovoltaics
tools.detailed_description: Code and data for machine learning-enabled chemical space exploration of all-inorganic perovskites for photovoltaics.

tools.name: GraphCW
tools.one_line_profile: Self-interpretable Graph Neural Network for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a self-interpretable Graph Neural Network using Concept Whitening for explainable AI in drug discovery and molecular property prediction.

tools.name: CBFV
tools.one_line_profile: Composition-based feature vector generator
tools.detailed_description: A tool to quickly create composition-based feature vectors for materials science machine learning tasks.

tools.name: 3D-PGT
tools.one_line_profile: Automated 3D Pre-Training for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of an automated 3D pre-training framework for molecular property prediction, as presented at KDD-23.

tools.name: ABT-MPNN
tools.one_line_profile: Atom-bond transformer-based MPNN for molecular properties
tools.detailed_description: An atom-bond transformer-based message passing neural network designed for accurate molecular property prediction.

tools.name: MultiAgentTrajPrediction
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Agent Trajectory Prediction Based on GNN
tools.detailed_description: Code for multi-agent trajectory prediction using Graph Neural Networks, applicable in robotics and autonomous systems research.

tools.name: NR-KG
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical Reasoning of Cross-modal Knowledge Graph for Material Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method for bridging the semantic-numerical gap in material property prediction using cross-modal knowledge graphs.

tools.name: MolPROP
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular language and graph representation fusion for property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool that fuses molecular language and graph representations to enhance molecular property prediction.

tools.name: ecloud
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic Charge Density (ECD) based 3D CNNs for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that uses electronic charge density (ECD) as a unified 3D descriptor for predicting physical and chemical properties of crystalline materials, specifically demonstrated for elastic properties.

tools.name: S-CGIB
tools.one_line_profile: Subgraph-conditioned Graph Information Bottleneck for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A novel architecture for pre-training Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) in molecular property prediction, utilizing a subgraph-conditioned Graph Information Bottleneck approach.

tools.name: ElemNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for predicting materials properties from elemental composition
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that predicts materials properties using only elemental composition as input, enabling fast screening of new materials without requiring crystal structure information.

tools.name: KERMT
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained graph neural network for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A pretrained Graph Neural Network (GNN) model designed for predicting molecular properties, leveraging transfer learning to improve performance on downstream tasks.

tools.name: ML-PV-Property-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: MLP model for photovoltaic material property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Multi-layer Perceptron (MLP) model implementation specifically designed for predicting properties of photovoltaic materials.

tools.name: ASPH-Code
tools.one_line_profile: Topological representations of crystalline compounds for property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of topological representations for crystalline compounds to enable machine-learning prediction of materials properties, focusing on algebraic topology features.

tools.name: PaddleMaterials
tools.one_line_profile: Materials science deep learning toolkit based on PaddlePaddle
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end toolkit for materials science and engineering based on the PaddlePaddle deep learning framework, featuring data-mechanism dual-driven foundation model development.

tools.name: 3D-ConvNeuralNet-material-property-prediction
tools.one_line_profile: 3D CNN for material property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Convolutional Neural Network implementation for predicting material properties from voxelized crystal structures.

tools.name: EGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Edge-Featured Graph Attention Network for molecular/reaction property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Edge-Featured Graph Attention Network (EGAT) for predicting properties of molecules and chemical reactions.

tools.name: uq_molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for uncertainty quantification in molecular property prediction using Bayesian deep learning techniques.

tools.name: Thermoelectrics-Discovery
tools.one_line_profile: ML pipeline for discovering thermoelectric transition metal oxides
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning pipeline utilizing gradient boosted trees to classify and predict the lattice thermal conductivity of transition metal oxides for thermoelectric applications.

tools.name: BGML
tools.one_line_profile: Band gap prediction of inorganic materials
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning tool for the automatic prediction of band gaps in inorganic materials.

tools.name: GBFS4MPPML
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient Boosted Feature Selection for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a pipeline combining Gradient Boosted Trees and statistical feature selection for predicting materials properties.

tools.name: ML4SMILES
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction using substructure vector embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting molecular properties using substructure vector embeddings within a feature selection workflow.

tools.name: mol_property
tools.one_line_profile: pKa prediction from chemical structure
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting pKa values from chemical structures using machine learning approaches and molecular similarity.

tools.name: cgnn
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Crystal Graph Neural Networks (CGNN) for predicting properties of crystalline materials.

tools.name: HimGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical molecular representation learning framework
tools.detailed_description: A hierarchical graph neural network (HimGNN) for learning molecular representations to improve property prediction accuracy.

tools.name: SGGRL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal representation learning for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SGGRL, a model that integrates Sequence, Graph, and Geometry modalities for molecular property prediction.

tools.name: ADKF-IFT
tools.one_line_profile: Meta-learning Adaptive Deep Kernel Gaussian Processes for molecular properties
tools.detailed_description: Official PyTorch implementation of ADKF-IFT, a meta-learning approach using Adaptive Deep Kernel Gaussian Processes for molecular property prediction.

tools.name: ComFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Complete and Efficient Graph Transformers for Crystal Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ComFormer, a graph transformer model designed for efficient and accurate prediction of crystal material properties.

tools.name: Matformer
tools.one_line_profile: Periodic Graph Transformers for Crystal Material Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of Matformer, a periodic graph transformer architecture specifically designed for predicting properties of crystal materials.

tools.name: GANN
tools.one_line_profile: Multiscale Graph Attention Neural Networks for materials and molecules
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Multiscale Graph Attention Neural Networks (GANN) for mapping and predicting properties of materials and molecules.

tools.name: CGCNN_adsorption_prediction
tools.one_line_profile: CGCNN for adsorption prediction of Nb2CTx
tools.detailed_description: A specific implementation of Crystal Graph Convolution Neural Networks (CGCNN) tailored for predicting the adsorption ability of Nb2CTx towards heavy metal ions.

tools.name: FraGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment-oriented multi-scale graph attention model for molecular properties
tools.detailed_description: FraGAT is a deep learning model that utilizes a fragment-oriented multi-scale graph attention mechanism for accurate molecular property prediction.

tools.name: chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Message Passing Neural Networks for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for training Message Passing Neural Networks (MPNNs) for molecular property prediction, including features for uncertainty quantification and active learning.

tools.name: Geo-DEG
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical grammar-induced geometry model for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that leverages hierarchical grammar-induced geometry for data-efficient molecular property prediction, specifically designed to handle 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: ChemML
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning and informatics program suite for chemical and materials sciences
tools.detailed_description: ChemML is a machine learning and informatics program suite designed for the chemical and materials sciences. It provides a comprehensive workflow for data representation, preprocessing, and modeling of chemical data.

tools.name: Automatminer
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic engine for predicting materials properties
tools.detailed_description: An automated machine learning (AutoML) engine specifically designed for materials science. It automates the pipeline of featurization, feature selection, and model training to predict materials properties from crystal structures.

tools.name: Matminer
tools.one_line_profile: Data mining and featurization library for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library for data mining in materials science, providing tools for retrieving data from various databases and generating complex feature vectors (descriptors) from materials structures and compositions for machine learning.

tools.name: Crystal-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for Crystal Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to benchmark various Graph Neural Network (GNN) architectures specifically for crystal property prediction, facilitating the comparison and evaluation of different models.

tools.name: MatDGL
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Graph Library for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A neural network package built on DGL that allows researchers to train custom graph neural network models for crystal modeling tasks and material property prediction.

tools.name: CGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal graph attention neural networks for materials prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Crystal Graph Attention Networks (CGAT) for predicting materials properties, utilizing attention mechanisms to capture atomic interactions in crystal structures.

tools.name: HiGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Informative Graph Neural Network for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A hierarchical graph neural network equipped with feature-wise attention for accurate molecular property prediction, capturing information at multiple structural levels.

tools.name: Matbench Discovery
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for high-throughput materials discovery models
tools.detailed_description: A framework for evaluating machine learning models in the context of simulating high-throughput materials discovery, assessing their ability to identify stable materials from large candidate pools.

tools.name: Pymatviz
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for visualizations in materials informatics
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit dedicated to creating visualizations for materials informatics, including plots for element distribution, crystal structures, and model performance metrics.

tools.name: CrysGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Distilling pre-trained knowledge for crystalline materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network model that utilizes knowledge distillation from pre-trained models to enhance property prediction accuracy for crystalline materials.

tools.name: MatEx
tools.one_line_profile: Out-of-distribution property prediction in materials and molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool for handling out-of-distribution (OOD) property prediction in materials and molecules, focusing on extrapolation capabilities for discovering novel materials.

tools.name: Torch-Molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for molecular discovery
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based deep learning package designed for molecular discovery, offering an sklearn-style interface for tasks like property prediction, inverse design, and representation learning.

tools.name: MolecularGNN-3D
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network for molecular property prediction from 3D structures
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network implementation specifically designed to predict molecular properties by leveraging 3D structural information.

tools.name: Materials Project API
tools.one_line_profile: Official API client for the Materials Project database
tools.detailed_description: The official Python client library for accessing the Materials Project API, enabling programmatic retrieval of materials data, properties, and structures for research and analysis.

tools.name: Matbench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for materials science property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking suite for evaluating machine learning models on materials science property prediction tasks, maintained by the Materials Project.

tools.name: M3GNet
tools.one_line_profile: Materials graph network with 3-body interactions and DFT surrogate
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network potential that includes 3-body interactions, serving as a DFT surrogate for crystal relaxation and property prediction.

tools.name: maml
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Materials Machine Learning and descriptors
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for materials machine learning, providing tools for materials descriptors, machine learning force fields, and deep learning models.

tools.name: MatGL
tools.one_line_profile: Graph deep learning library for materials
tools.detailed_description: A graph deep learning library for materials science, implementing models like M3GNet and MEGNet using Deep Graph Library (DGL) and PyTorch.

tools.name: MEGNet
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Networks as a Universal Machine Learning Framework for Molecules and Crystals
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of MatErials Graph Networks (MEGNet) for predicting properties of molecules and crystals using graph deep learning.

tools.name: Veidt
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library specifically tailored for materials science applications, providing models and utilities for property prediction.

tools.name: JointMolecularModel
tools.one_line_profile: Joint AE and property prediction model for OOD molecules
tools.detailed_description: A model combining a joint Autoencoder and property predictor to estimate Out-of-Distribution (OOD) molecules and quantify uncertainty in molecular predictions.

tools.name: Deep-Learning-High-Entropy-Alloys
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for structural analysis of HEA STEM images
tools.detailed_description: A computer vision tool based on Deep Learning to extract structural information and identify chemical species in Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy (STEM) images of High Entropy Alloys.

tools.name: Chemperium
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python library/tool for applying machine learning techniques to predict molecular properties.

tools.name: CGCNNDefect
tools.one_line_profile: CGCNN modified for defect calculations
tools.detailed_description: A modified version of the Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Network (CGCNN) specifically adapted for performing defect calculations in materials.

tools.name: SGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Slab graph convolutional neural networks for surface properties
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Graph Convolutional Neural Network designed for slab structures to predict surface-related material properties.

tools.name: GNNOpt
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for prediction of optical spectra from crystal structures
tools.detailed_description: A Universal Ensemble-Embedding Graph Neural Network designed for the direct prediction of optical spectra from crystal structures.

tools.name: JAQPOT Quattro API
tools.one_line_profile: RESTful web service for toxicological predictions
tools.detailed_description: The API implementation for JAQPOT Quattro, a web service used to train machine learning models and obtain toxicological predictions for chemical compounds and nanomaterials.

tools.name: FragNet
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network model designed for molecular property prediction, featuring interpretability capabilities.

tools.name: GNN-materials
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Networks for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A codebase implementing Graph Neural Networks specifically for applications in computational materials science.

tools.name: combined-gnn
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for predicting energy of crystal structures
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network implementation for predicting the energy of both known and hypothetical crystal structures.

tools.name: mapp_api
tools.one_line_profile: Batch calculation for Materials Properties Prediction
tools.detailed_description: API and batch calculation scripts for the Materials Properties Prediction project, facilitating high-throughput property calculations.

tools.name: deepKNet
tools.one_line_profile: PointNet-based 3D deep learning for crystalline materials
tools.detailed_description: A 3D deep learning model based on PointNet, designed to decode structure-property relationships for generic crystalline materials.

tools.name: pGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Featurizer using pretrained GNNs for materials
tools.detailed_description: A utility that uses pretrained graph neural networks to extract features from materials structures for downstream tasks.

tools.name: MOF-CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: CGCNN variant for predicting MOF methane uptake
tools.detailed_description: A modified Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Network (CGCNN) designed to efficiently and accurately predict methane volumetric uptakes in Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs).

tools.name: OOD_Materials_Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for out-of-distribution material property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark study and codebase for evaluating structure-based out-of-distribution (OOD) material property prediction models.

tools.name: ACANet
tools.one_line_profile: Activity-Cliff Awareness Graph Learning for Molecular Properties
tools.detailed_description: A graph learning model that incorporates activity-cliff awareness to enable robust molecular property prediction.

tools.name: materials_data_api_scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts to load data from ICSD, Materials Project, and OQMD
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts to facilitate the loading and processing of materials data from major databases like ICSD, Materials Project, and OQMD.

tools.name: mt-cgcnn
tools.one_line_profile: Multitask CGCNN for material property prediction
tools.detailed_description: An integration of Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Network (CGCNN) with multitask learning techniques for predicting multiple material properties simultaneously.

tools.name: matbench-genmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Generative materials benchmarking metrics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing metrics for benchmarking generative models in materials science, inspired by Guacamol and CDVAE.

tools.name: GATGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph convolutional neural networks with global attention for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Graph Convolutional Neural Networks with Global Attention (GATGNN) designed for improved prediction of materials properties from crystal structures.

tools.name: PAR
tools.one_line_profile: Property-Aware Relation Networks for few-shot molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Property-Aware Relation Networks (PAR) for few-shot molecular property prediction, as presented at NeurIPS 2021. It addresses the data scarcity issue in molecular discovery.

tools.name: cgcnn
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A package for predicting material properties from crystal structures using Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks (CGCNN). It provides a framework for learning material representations directly from the connection of atoms in the crystal.

tools.name: deeperGATGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable graph neural networks for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: An advanced implementation of Graph Neural Networks (GATGNN) designed for scalability and improved accuracy in predicting materials properties from crystal structures.

tools.name: ALIGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Atomistic Line Graph Neural Network for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: The Atomistic Line Graph Neural Network (ALIGNN) is a model that performs message passing on both the interatomic bond graph and its corresponding line graph, capturing many-body interactions for accurate materials property prediction.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software package for data-driven atomistic materials design
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive python library for atomistic materials design, including tools for high-throughput DFT calculations, machine learning (classical and deep learning), and accessing the JARVIS-DFT database.

tools.name: soapgp
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Property Prediction using Gaussian Processes with SOAP kernel
tools.detailed_description: A library for molecular property prediction utilizing Gaussian Processes (GP) combined with the Smooth Overlap of Atomic Positions (SOAP) kernel, enabling accurate predictions based on atomic environments.

tools.name: K-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-based BERT for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of K-BERT (Knowledge-enabled BERT) adapted for molecular property prediction, leveraging pre-trained language models and domain knowledge for chemical tasks.

tools.name: XenonPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for materials informatics and transfer learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for materials informatics that provides a comprehensive set of tools for descriptor generation, transfer learning, and materials property prediction, focusing on small datasets.

tools.name: GLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive graph learning for molecular interactions and properties
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the GLAM (Graph Learning with Adaptive Mechanisms) method for automated prediction of molecular interactions and properties.

tools.name: MGSSL
tools.one_line_profile: Motif-based Graph Self-Supervised Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for molecular property prediction that utilizes motif-based graph self-supervised learning to learn molecular representations.

tools.name: Molecular-graph-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised learning for molecular property prediction using Graph BERT
tools.detailed_description: A model combining Graph Neural Networks and BERT architecture for semi-supervised learning on molecular graphs to predict molecular properties.

tools.name: Meta-MGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Graph Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A meta-learning framework based on Graph Neural Networks designed for few-shot molecular property prediction tasks.
